title: Unspecified error
body: I've been having this problem for the past few weeks and it randomly sorts itself but all of a sudden for the past 3 days I've been unable to get it to even 50% it stops at random times and I haven't a clue what to do now, I have the patcher logs and I will attach them to this post please if anyone can help it would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Around 50%, your patcher is trying to grab updates from the patching server but a poor connection may be causing it to backtrack or disconnect.  GO through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
